title: Chicago turns to ZocDoc
description:
The U.S. is well underway with its Covid-19 vaccine rollout, but so far, things have not been running smoothly. Across many states, there’s no one-place to go to sign up for a vaccine. In the absence of a centralized platform, local governments have been turning to private tools to help make appointments. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Chicago turns to ZocDoc
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Streamlining online vaccination signups only fixes a small part of the distribution problem.
